description.value:
Your undead physiology allows you to leap quickly toward or away from your opponent. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Leap]{Leap}. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

If you are satiated, you can choose to end your satiation to instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.High Jump]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Long Jump]{Long Jump} without triggering reactions, as you take a quick, enormous jump before any foe can react to your movement.
